item.title: Movie Quoteâ€¦
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: "I've already wasted my whole life. I want to tell you with my last breath that I have always loved you. I would rather be a ghost, drifting by your side as a condemned soul, than enter heaven without you. Because of your love, I will never be a lonely spirit."
